title: Potato-Leek Bisque
directions: In a large saucepan or soup pot, melt butter over medium-high heat.
Add leeks and garlic; saute about 5 minutes or until tender.
Add chicken stock, potatoes, and the tomatoes. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree soup in a blender.
Return soup to pan. Stir in cream and heat through over low heat. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 4 large leeks, white part only, chopped
